channel.title: CVE Feed for Toast Plugins -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Toast Plugins -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-49308|2024-10-17T18:48:37.623Z -- toast%20plugins -- animator
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Toast Plugins Animator allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Animator: from n/a through 3.0.11.

item.title: CVE-2024-33646|2024-06-04T17:43:55.579Z -- toast%20plugins -- sticky%20anything
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Toast Plugins Sticky Anything allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Sticky Anything: from n/a through 2.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-33646|2024-08-02T02:36:04.572Z -- toast%20plugins -- sticky%20anything
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Toast Plugins Sticky Anything allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Sticky Anything: from n/a through 2.1.5.
